org.apache.ambari.server.topology

Class AsyncCallableService<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.topology.AsyncCallableService<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type returned by the task to be executed
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Callable<T>

    public class AsyncCallableService<T>
extends Object
implements Callable<T>
    Callable service implementation for executing tasks asynchronously. The service repeatedly tries to execute the provided task till it successfully completes, or the provided timeout interval is exceeded.
